name: SZEN
description:
What is SZEN?
  • A short, standing VR experience that features charming and calming music composed by Daniel Manoiu.
  • A 360° musical Virtual Reality safe-space, where we can leave our hectic, busy lives for a moment and enter a world where you experience a place of melodic tranquility
  • A place to disconnect for a little while and feel childlike wonder

SZEN was developed as a VR Experience for the HTC VIVE. Vive controller wand use is optional, but using it allows you to skip ahead if you want to get to your favorite part quickly.
